Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

params._conditionIndexes: The array of the indexes of close conditions for each position.
params._ids: An array of IDs of the positions to be closed.
params._megaRoutes: An array of routes for swap.
params._positionAsset: The address of the position asset.
params._soldAsset: The address of the borrowed asset.

params._registry: The address of the PrimexRegistry contract.

params._positionManager: The address of the PositionManager contract.
params._priceOracle: The address of the PriceOracle contract.
params._whiteBlackList: The address of the WhiteBlackList contract.

pause().details: Triggers stopped state. This function can only be called by an address with the EMERGENCY_ADMIN role. Requirements: - The contract must not be paused.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

setGasPerBatch(uint256).details: Only callable by the MEDIUM_TIMELOCK_ADMIN role.

setGasPerPosition(uint256).details: Only callable by the MEDIUM_TIMELOCK_ADMIN role.

unpause().details: Returns to normal state. This function can only be called by an address with the SMALL_TIMELOCK_ADMIN or MEDIUM_TIMELOCK_ADMIN role depending on the contract. Requirements: - The contract must be paused.

initialize(address).notice: Initializes the contract with the specified parameters.

initializeAfterUpgrade(address,address,a.notice: Re-Initializes the contract with the specified parameters.

positionManager().notice: Retrieves the address of PositionManager contract.

priceOracle().notice: Retrieves the address of PriceOracle contract.

registry().notice: Retrieves the address of Registry contract.

setGasPerBatch(uint256).notice: Set the gas amount per batch.

setGasPerPosition(uint256).notice: Set the gas amount per position.

whiteBlackList().notice: Retrieves the address of WhiteBlackList contract.
